positions.title: System Support Engineer
positions.description_html:
ROLES:
Manage & provide 1st Level technical support for Contact Centre Infrastructure, IT Security & Assurance in accessing core banking system, managing Disaster Recovery Infrastructure for Contact Centre.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

SYSTEM SUPPORT:
•Act as liaison link between the business, project team, iCIMB Client care and the technical team to ensure requirements are met.
•To perform daily monitoring of the PABX and IVR system to ensure system uptime.
•To document and report all failure for appropriate resolutions.
•To perform periodic system/ data backup using Brightstor Arcserve Apps.
•To perform first-level support and troubleshoot in event of system failure.
•To report any unsolved system failure to appropriate parties and to follow up for appropriate resolution.
•To perform check on current security features and functions and to initiate on improvement as need arises.
•To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.
•To report any security violation or non-compliances by staff in the usage of IT equipment and features to the appropriate parties in timely manner.
•To monitor system performance and recommend appropriate enhancement or changes required based on operational or business needs.

IT SECURITY:
•To ensure that all staff are in compliance with the CIMB group’s System and Security Policies and procedures.
•To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.

DOCUMENTATION & PROCEDURES:
•To provide monthly system uptime reports.
•To maintain a summary list of all system reports and files them accordingly.
•To develop and establish department standards and procedures.
•To maintain and ensure that system flow procedure and system architectures are updated periodically.

recommendations: Troels N√∏rgaard ‚ÄúAs a Java J2EE consultant for Custom Solutions I was hired by Jesper and had the pleasure to work with him on a daily basis. While being new to the organization Jesper did a lot to make me feel welcome and getting up to speed with the rest of the team. He excelled as manager with clear, conscientious directions and the warm spirit of a true mentor without being intrusive. Always feeling present and available to help whenever needed. He is very structured and methodical in his approach to the daily work, which helps bringing form to a very erratic realm. His adept ability to cope with organizational issues that emerge from dealing with multiple stakeholders in custom solutions, gave claim for the developers to focus on developing software instead of dealing with non-software related issues. His adaptive, rather than predictive, approach helped direct the software development process in a domain not variable by its scope. Great knowledge of the technical details used to implement the custom solutions gave him a considerable advantage and ability to spot design and implementation issues miles away, continuous keeping a tap on the general direction of development. I sincerely miss working with Jesper and he has my highest recommendation.‚Äù

Mark Thorpe ‚ÄúJesper is one of those rare people who has an innate ability to design and articulate a highly complex technical solution in a way that is easily understood by a less technically-competent audience. Often dealing with the concurrent demands of running a busy professional services department with multiple projects in flight, whilst simultaneously being called to advise upon technical best practise for enterprise software deployment and integration, Jesper would approach any challenge with cheerful enthusiasm and a quiet confidence, and could always be relied upon to deliver to an agreed deadline. Jesper is a true professional with whom I enjoyed working, and from whom I have learned much.‚Äù

publications.title: Intelligent Electricity Broker
publications.subtitle: ICEAS 2012, Beijing, China (Applied Science)
publications.description: The Intelligent Electricity Broker (IEB) is a new energy storage and broker facility that serves two purposes. Firstly, it allows for storing excessive energy in the Smart Grid it is connected to. Secondly, it runs a broker-algorithm that ensures that energy is purchased and sold when financially viable to the system owner. This paper describes how the IEB can be used by house owners, cluster owners, and/or energy providers to take advantage of electricity stock market prices and weather forecasts to act as energy surplus storage buffers as well as to lower electricity bills, and outlines the heuristic algorithm that supports the IEB.

recommendations: Troels N√∏rgaard ‚ÄúAs a Java J2EE consultant for Custom Solutions I was hired by Jesper and had the pleasure to work with him on a daily basis. While being new to the organization Jesper did a lot to make me feel welcome and getting up to speed with the rest of the team. He excelled as manager with clear, conscientious directions and the warm spirit of a true mentor without being intrusive. Always feeling present and available to help whenever needed. He is very structured and methodical in his approach to the daily work, which helps bringing form to a very erratic realm. His adept ability to cope with organizational issues that emerge from dealing with multiple stakeholders in custom solutions, gave claim for the developers to focus on developing software instead of dealing with non-software related issues. His adaptive, rather than predictive, approach helped direct the software development process in a domain not variable by its scope. Great knowledge of the technical details used to implement the custom solutions gave him a considerable advantage and ability to spot design and implementation issues miles away, continuous keeping a tap on the general direction of development. I sincerely miss working with Jesper and he has my highest recommendation.‚Äù

Mark Thorpe ‚ÄúJesper is one of those rare people who has an innate ability to design and articulate a highly complex technical solution in a way that is easily understood by a less technically-competent audience. Often dealing with the concurrent demands of running a busy professional services department with multiple projects in flight, whilst simultaneously being called to advise upon technical best practise for enterprise software deployment and integration, Jesper would approach any challenge with cheerful enthusiasm and a quiet confidence, and could always be relied upon to deliver to an agreed deadline. Jesper is a true professional with whom I enjoyed working, and from whom I have learned much.‚Äù

publications.title: Intelligent Electricity Broker
publications.subtitle: ICEAS 2012, Beijing, China (Applied Science)
publications.description: The Intelligent Electricity Broker (IEB) is a new energy storage and broker facility that serves two purposes. Firstly, it allows for storing excessive energy in the Smart Grid it is connected to. Secondly, it runs a broker-algorithm that ensures that energy is purchased and sold when financially viable to the system owner. This paper describes how the IEB can be used by house owners, cluster owners, and/or energy providers to take advantage of electricity stock market prices and weather forecasts to act as energy surplus storage buffers as well as to lower electricity bills, and outlines the heuristic algorithm that supports the IEB.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

positions.subtitle: CASHe - Bangladesh

positions.description_html:
• Implemented strategic initiatives to drive growth and expansion of CMSME lending products and services in the millennial market.
• Developed and executed innovative marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and customer acquisition.
• Led cross-functional teams to optimize the Social Loan Quotient (SLQ) algorithm, resulting in improved credit rating accuracy and customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Spearheaded the establishment of Lankan Alliance Finance, developing policies, and ensuring compliance with a 'no npl' policy.‚Ä¢ Led initiatives for SME and Agriculture financing partnerships, supporting economic growth in underserved sectors.‚Ä¢ Orchestrated fee based IPFF Financing with World Bank and Bangladesh Bank for a large corporate ( Fiber at Home Limited) in the IT and networking sector.

• Led initiatives for SME and Agriculture financing partnerships, supporting economic growth in underserved sectors.
• Orchestrated fee based IPFF Financing with World Bank and Bangladesh Bank for a large corporate ( Fiber at Home Limited) in the IT and networking sector.

• Negotiated loan terms with creditors to improve financial stability.
• Developed comprehensive restructuring plans aligned with clients' cash flow and operations.

experience.title: Executive Vice President

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

positions.description: ROLES: Manage & provide 1st Level technical support for Contact Centre Infrastructure, IT Security & Assurance in accessing core banking system, managing Disaster Recovery Infrastructure for Contact Centre.RESPONSIBILITIES:SYSTEM SUPPORT:‚Ä¢Act as liaison link between the business, project team, iCIMB Client care and the technical team to ensure requirements are met.‚Ä¢To perform daily monitoring of the PABX and IVR system to ensure system uptime.‚Ä¢To document and report all failure for appropriate resolutions.‚Ä¢To perform periodic system/ data backup using Brightstor Arcserve Apps.‚Ä¢To perform first-level support and troubleshoot in event of system failure. ‚Ä¢To report any unsolved system failure to appropriate parties and to follow up for appropriate resolution. ‚Ä¢To perform check on current security features and functions and to initiate on improvement as need arises.‚Ä¢To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.‚Ä¢To report any security violation or non-compliances by staff in the usage of IT equipment and features to the appropriate parties in timely manner.‚Ä¢To monitor system performance and recommend appropriate enhancement or changes required based on operational or business needs.IT SECURITY:‚Ä¢To ensure that all staff are in compliance with the CIMB group‚Äôs System and Security Policies and procedures.‚Ä¢To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.DOCUMENTATION & PROCEDURES:‚Ä¢To provide monthly system uptime reports.‚Ä¢To maintain a summary list of all system reports and files them accordingly.‚Ä¢To develop and establish department standards and procedures.‚Ä¢To maintain and ensure that system flow procedure and system architectures are updated periodically.
positions.title: System Support Engineer
positions.description_html:
ROLES:
Manage & provide 1st Level technical support for Contact Centre Infrastructure, IT Security & Assurance in accessing core banking system, managing Disaster Recovery Infrastructure for Contact Centre.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

SYSTEM SUPPORT:
•Act as liaison link between the business, project team, iCIMB Client care and the technical team to ensure requirements are met.
•To perform daily monitoring of the PABX and IVR system to ensure system uptime.
•To document and report all failure for appropriate resolutions.
•To perform periodic system/ data backup using Brightstor Arcserve Apps.
•To perform first-level support and troubleshoot in event of system failure.
•To report any unsolved system failure to appropriate parties and to follow up for appropriate resolution.
•To perform check on current security features and functions and to initiate on improvement as need arises.
•To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.
•To report any security violation or non-compliances by staff in the usage of IT equipment and features to the appropriate parties in timely manner.
•To monitor system performance and recommend appropriate enhancement or changes required based on operational or business needs.

IT SECURITY:
•To ensure that all staff are in compliance with the CIMB group’s System and Security Policies and procedures.
•To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.

DOCUMENTATION & PROCEDURES:
•To provide monthly system uptime reports.
•To maintain a summary list of all system reports and files them accordingly.
•To develop and establish department standards and procedures.
•To maintain and ensure that system flow procedure and system architectures are updated periodically.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

positions.subtitle: CIMB
positions.description: ROLES: Manage & provide 1st Level technical support for Contact Centre Infrastructure, IT Security & Assurance in accessing core banking system, managing Disaster Recovery Infrastructure for Contact Centre.RESPONSIBILITIES:SYSTEM SUPPORT:‚Ä¢Act as liaison link between the business, project team, iCIMB Client care and the technical team to ensure requirements are met.‚Ä¢To perform daily monitoring of the PABX and IVR system to ensure system uptime.‚Ä¢To document and report all failure for appropriate resolutions.‚Ä¢To perform periodic system/ data backup using Brightstor Arcserve Apps.‚Ä¢To perform first-level support and troubleshoot in event of system failure. ‚Ä¢To report any unsolved system failure to appropriate parties and to follow up for appropriate resolution. ‚Ä¢To perform check on current security features and functions and to initiate on improvement as need arises.‚Ä¢To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.‚Ä¢To report any security violation or non-compliances by staff in the usage of IT equipment and features to the appropriate parties in timely manner.‚Ä¢To monitor system performance and recommend appropriate enhancement or changes required based on operational or business needs.IT SECURITY:‚Ä¢To ensure that all staff are in compliance with the CIMB group‚Äôs System and Security Policies and procedures.‚Ä¢To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.DOCUMENTATION & PROCEDURES:‚Ä¢To provide monthly system uptime reports.‚Ä¢To maintain a summary list of all system reports and files them accordingly.‚Ä¢To develop and establish department standards and procedures.‚Ä¢To maintain and ensure that system flow procedure and system architectures are updated periodically.
positions.title: System Support Engineer
positions.description_html:
ROLES:
Manage & provide 1st Level technical support for Contact Centre Infrastructure, IT Security & Assurance in accessing core banking system, managing Disaster Recovery Infrastructure for Contact Centre.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

SYSTEM SUPPORT:
•Act as liaison link between the business, project team, iCIMB Client care and the technical team to ensure requirements are met.
•To perform daily monitoring of the PABX and IVR system to ensure system uptime.
•To document and report all failure for appropriate resolutions.
•To perform periodic system/ data backup using Brightstor Arcserve Apps.
•To perform first-level support and troubleshoot in event of system failure.
•To report any unsolved system failure to appropriate parties and to follow up for appropriate resolution.
•To perform check on current security features and functions and to initiate on improvement as need arises.
•To ensure that existing and new creation of system and user ID are tagged with the appropriate authorization.
•To report any security violation or non-compliances by staff in the usage of IT equipment and features to the appropriate parties in timely manner.
•To monitor system performance and recommend appropriate enhancement or changes required based on operational or business needs.

IT SECURITY:
•To ensure that all staff are in compliance with the CIMB group’s System and Security Policies and procedures.

projects.title: Risk Analysis for the Launch of CashE from PT. Square Gate One
projects.description: This project analyzed 15 cybersecurity risks across key CashE app features: Top-Up, Balance Check, Cash Out, Payment, Transfer, and Split Bill. Using ISO/IEC 27005, with assessed risks like unauthorized access, data breaches, and transaction forgery. Mitigation strategies included 2FA, TLS encryption, digital signatures, and real time monitoring. Each risk was mapped by severity and treated with preventive, detective, or corrective controls to ensure a secure product launch.

projects.title: Pizza Management System Application
projects.description: Java based desktop application developed using the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) with Java Swing for the GUI and MySQL as the database. Designed to streamline operations in a pizza restaurant, it supports two user roles as an Admin and Cashier with functionalities such as order placement, automatic PDF bill generation, menu and category management, and secure user authentication. Admins can manage products, verify users, and oversee orders, while both roles can handle daily transactions efficiently. The system emphasizes modular code structure through OOP pillars like encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism to ensure scalability, maintainability, and a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Elysian Hands of Harmony - Social Project
projects.description: As part of a social project course at President University, my team and I initiated ‚ÄúElysian Hands of Harmony‚Äù, a community outreach program aimed at supporting the children of Gema Insan Amanah orphanage through digital literacy education and psychosocial activities. Our project combined elements of Indonesian valuesa; Pancasila, citizenship, and religion, while teaching responsible technology use, internet safety, and emotional well-being through interactive learning and games. With a strong foundation in Social Learning Theory, we empowered children aged 11‚Äì14 to build confidence in digital environments while fostering collaboration and compassion. This initiative not only addressed educational and emotional gaps, but also strengthened our engagement with real-world social issues.

projects.title: Glamourous Beauty Salon Management System Website
projects.description: Web based salon management system developed using server-side internet programming with PHP and MySQL for database management. The project supports key salon operations such as customer appointment booking, staff and service registration, skill management, and real-time data updates. It includes dynamic web forms for managing entities like customers, staff, services, skills, and appointments, with full CRUD functionality. The system enforces business rules such as unique user identification, appointment scheduling constraints, and staff-service skill mapping. It also implements ER modeling, normalization, and SQL queries (including joins, subqueries, and groupings) to ensure a structured, efficient, and scalable backend.

detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

positions.subtitle: CASHe - Bangladesh
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Implemented strategic initiatives to drive growth and expansion of CMSME lending products and services in the millennial market.‚Ä¢ Developed and executed innovative marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and customer acquisition.‚Ä¢ Led cross-functional teams to optimize the Social Loan Quotient (SLQ) algorithm, resulting in improved credit rating accuracy and customer satisfaction.
positions.title: Chief Operating Officer
positions.description_html:
• Implemented strategic initiatives to drive growth and expansion of CMSME lending products and services in the millennial market.
• Developed and executed innovative marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and customer acquisition.
• Led cross-functional teams to optimize the Social Loan Quotient (SLQ) algorithm, resulting in improved credit rating accuracy and customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Spearheaded the establishment of Lankan Alliance Finance, developing policies, and ensuring compliance with a 'no npl' policy.‚Ä¢ Led initiatives for SME and Agriculture financing partnerships, supporting economic growth in underserved sectors.‚Ä¢ Orchestrated fee based IPFF Financing with World Bank and Bangladesh Bank for a large corporate ( Fiber at Home Limited) in the IT and networking sector.

• Spearheaded the establishment of Lankan Alliance Finance, developing policies, and ensuring compliance with a 'no npl' policy.
• Led initiatives for SME and Agriculture financing partnerships, supporting economic growth in underserved sectors.
• Orchestrated fee based IPFF Financing with World Bank and Bangladesh Bank for a large corporate ( Fiber at Home Limited) in the IT and networking sector.

experience.title: Consultant

• Analyzed financial health to determine optimal restructuring options for clients.
• Negotiated loan terms with creditors to improve financial stability.
• Developed comprehensive restructuring plans aligned with clients' cash flow and operations.

experience.title: Executive Vice President

• Led a team of 25 professional bankers in the largest branch of AB Bank Limited, managing a 50 billion BDT portfolio.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

 Monitoring the security aspects and internal controls

detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

matched.match_rationale: Nasim A. holds a senior position as Chief Operating Officer and has experience in financial services, which aligns with Debjit Roy's role in finance and business development.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.

positions.subtitle: CASHe - Bangladesh
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Implemented strategic initiatives to drive growth and expansion of CMSME lending products and services in the millennial market.‚Ä¢ Developed and executed innovative marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and customer acquisition.‚Ä¢ Led cross-functional teams to optimize the Social Loan Quotient (SLQ) algorithm, resulting in improved credit rating accuracy and customer satisfaction.
positions.title: Chief Operating Officer
positions.description_html:
• Implemented strategic initiatives to drive growth and expansion of CMSME lending products and services in the millennial market.
• Developed and executed innovative marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and customer acquisition.
• Led cross-functional teams to optimize the Social Loan Quotient (SLQ) algorithm, resulting in improved credit rating accuracy and customer satisfaction.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Spearheaded the establishment of Lankan Alliance Finance, developing policies, and ensuring compliance with a 'no npl' policy.‚Ä¢ Led initiatives for SME and Agriculture financing partnerships, supporting economic growth in underserved sectors.‚Ä¢ Orchestrated fee based IPFF Financing with World Bank and Bangladesh Bank for a large corporate ( Fiber at Home Limited) in the IT and networking sector.
experience.description_html:
• Spearheaded the establishment of Lankan Alliance Finance, developing policies, and ensuring compliance with a 'no npl' policy.
• Led initiatives for SME and Agriculture financing partnerships, supporting economic growth in underserved sectors.
• Orchestrated fee based IPFF Financing with World Bank and Bangladesh Bank for a large corporate ( Fiber at Home Limited) in the IT and networking sector.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Analyzed financial health to determine optimal restructuring options for clients.‚Ä¢ Negotiated loan terms with creditors to improve financial stability.‚Ä¢ Developed comprehensive restructuring plans aligned with clients' cash flow and operations.
experience.description_html:
• Analyzed financial health to determine optimal restructuring options for clients.
• Negotiated loan terms with creditors to improve financial stability.
• Developed comprehensive restructuring plans aligned with clients' cash flow and operations.

experience.title: Executive Vice President
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Led a team of 25 professional bankers in the largest branch of AB Bank Limited, managing a 50 billion BDT portfolio.‚Ä¢ Assisted Corporate Business Heads in meeting budget goals for assets and liabilities, ensuring business growth and financial stability.‚Ä¢ Prepared and presented Credit/Board Memos, evaluated proposals, and maintained compliance with regulatory requirements.
experience.description_html:
• Led a team of 25 professional bankers in the largest branch of AB Bank Limited, managing a 50 billion BDT portfolio.
• Assisted Corporate Business Heads in meeting budget goals for assets and liabilities, ensuring business growth and financial stability.
• Prepared and presented Credit/Board Memos, evaluated proposals, and maintained compliance with regulatory requirements.

detailed_profile.name: Nasim A.
detailed_profile.position: Financial Advisor | IBA-ite, DU | Financial Inclusion Enthusiast |
detailed_profile.about: Steering the helm at DharDesh, my strategic acumen has been instrumental in launching and expanding digital lending in Bangladesh, in line with Fingular's vision for financial inclusion. With a laser focus on financial technology and customer-centric operations, I ensure seamless service delivery and regulatory compliance through productive partnerships. Championing a future where financial services are universally accessible, my professional path is defined by a steadfast commitment to leveraging fintech for economic empowerment and consumer resonance.

experience.title: Chief Operating Officer Bangladesh
experience.description: As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular‚Äôs vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
experience.description_html:
As COO of DharDesh ( a fingular.com company) Leading the launch and expansion of DharDesh in Bangladesh, aligning with Fingular’s vision for financial inclusion through digital lending.

Operational Management: Overseeing daily operations to ensure efficient delivery of digital lending services in collaboration with a local Non-Banking Financial Institution.

Partnership Coordination: Working with the local lending partner to leverage their expertise and ensure regulatory compliance for smooth service delivery.

Innovation and Technology: Implementing innovative financial technologies from Fingular to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

Customer Focus: Ensuring services are customer-centric, with transparent loan terms, competitive interest rates, and flexible repayment options for underserved populations.

Financial Inclusion Advocacy: Promoting financial inclusion by reaching out to underserved communities, including small business owners and individuals without traditional banking access.
